tag.changelog.description: Generates the changelog for the current release

tag.getAll.description: Returns all tags for a document

star.getAll.description: Returns all stared documents for the current user

document.revert.description: Reverts your document to this commit

document.reset.description: Reverts your document to the latest source

document.meta.description: Updates the meta data of an document

commit.getAll.description: Returns all commits for a document
